snippet.title: Rally Trophy Official Trailer (higher quality upload)
snippet.description:
This old official trailer for Bugbear Entertainment's fantastic debut game was already uploaded to YouTube a few years ago by MrSefe: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bYnIohq7g7g However, the sound and image quality seemed a bit weaker to me, so I've decided to do my own upload of the trailer. Hopefully, contemporary YouTube can render it better nowadays than in the past. This video should be higher quality (well, let's keep our fingers crossed for that).

Disclaimer: 
The trailer was created by JoWooD Productions AG and Bugbear Entertainment and is shown here in full unmodified form. This video is uploaded for entertainment purposes only, with no copyright infringement intended. No revenue is being made of this video.

Bugbear Entertainment:
http://www.bugbear.fi/

Some links: 
http://www.metacritic.com/game/pc/rally-trophy
http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/rally-trophy

P.S.: Despite the note at the end of the trailer, the XBox version of the game was never published. So please don't go looking for it, you'd only find the PC version.
